response.overview: Take Off (2017) is a critically acclaimed Indian Malayalam-language drama-thriller directed by Mahesh Narayanan. The film is based on the real-life rescue of Indian nurses trapped in Tikrit, Iraq, during the 2014 ISIS invasion.  Key Details: - Director: Mahesh Narayanan - Producer: Anto Joseph, Shebin Backer, Megha Rajesh - Cast:  - Parvathy Thiruvothu as Sameera, a nurse who is at the heart of the story.  - Fahadh Faasil as Indian Ambassador Manoj, who plays a pivotal role in the rescue.  - Kunchacko Boban as Shaheed, Sameeraâ€™s husband, also a nurse.
response.title: Takeoff 2017
